body:
Comment 10: 
(Sorry for the delay. Came back late at night, responded and went to sleep. Im in US
East Coast).

ctx is a Context Object passed around during the request. It contains a SafeStore which
is a wrapper around a map[interface{}]interface{} with methods which mutex lock/unlock
around put/get/delete operations and can handle expiration.

I'm not sure where you're going with this, but if you explain, maybe I can help better.
